definitions.definition: a level area surrounded by seats for spectators, in which sports, entertainments, and other public events are held.
examples: stadium; Moreamphitheater, coliseum; sportsplex; field, ring, court; bowl, park, ground; rink, ice rink; historicalcircus "a hockey arena"Moreamphitheater, coliseum; sportsplex; field, ring, court; bowl, park, ground; rink, ice rink; circus a hockey arena

definitions.definition: a place or scene of activity, debate, or conflict.
examples: he has re-entered the political arena
